lead_paragraph: The arrest of Mr. Esteves, who once epitomized Brazil’s global ambitions, in a corruption investigation has rattled the financial community.

byline.contributor: Vinod Sreeharsha contributed reporting from Rio de Janeiro.

snippet: The arrest of Mr. Esteves, who once epitomized Brazil’s global ambitions, in a corruption investigation has rattled the financial community.

headline.main: Downfall of André Esteves Stands Out in Brazil Scandal
headline.print_headline: Downfall of Ambitious Banker Rattles Brazil’s Financial Industry

abstract: Obstruction of justice charges levied against powerful Brazilian banker Andre Esteves, who built financial giant BTG Pactual into most influential and wide-reaching bank in Brazil, have shaken nation's financial market; his rise in banking and details of Petrobras scandal, which led to current charges, chronicled.
